about_the_game:
Story:

You play as a young man who goes to a country house with his parents to celebrate Christmas. However, the father suddenly has to leave on business, but soon it becomes known that he will not be able to return due to a car breakdown. Left alone with your mother, you begin dinner, over which several glasses of wine are consumed. As the evening progresses, your conversations become more personal and frank, revealing unexpected topics and creating a special atmosphere between you. You kiss your mom passionately on the neck and on the lips, and then you fuck her in all her holes. Mom resists a little at first, but gives herself to you. All this bonding leads to some unexpected twists and turns.

Key Features:

Deep Narrative: Dive into an intriguing story full of unexpected twists and secrets.
Quality Animation: Enjoy detailed and high quality sex animations.
Cool soundtrack: Discover the atmosphere of the game with an emotionally rich soundtrack.

content_descriptors.notes:
WARNING!
This game is intended for ADULTS only and contains sexually explicit material that some viewers may find offensive. The game contains incest. All characters shown in the game are over the age of 18.

However, the father suddenly has to leave on business, but soon it becomes known that he will not be able to return due to a car breakdown. name: Slutty Mommy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Slutty Mommy is a visual novel for adult audiences. You play as a young man who arrives at a country house with his parents to celebrate Christmas. The father is unable to attend and you are left alone with the hot mom, which leads to lewd situations.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Greek, Danish, Indonesian, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese
